description:
SuperFamiconv is a tile graphics converter with flexible and composable command line options.

It supports generation of map and tile data (and for some platforms, sprite data), including output in non-binary formats like JSON.  Additionally, it supports tile optimization (discarding redundant tiles, including those which can be optimized through H/V flipping).

Systems supported include the Game Boy, Game Boy Color, Game Boy Advance, Genesis and Mega Drive, PC Engine and TurboGrafx-16, Super Famicom and Super Nintendo, WonderSwan, and WonderSwan Color.

For further information, please refer to the SuperFamiconv documentation itself located on GitHub.
summary: A tile graphics converter for classic video game consoles and handhelds
author: Optiroc
